contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} '''Wade Fox''' (1920 - 1964) was a [[United States|U.S.]] [[zoologist]] and [[herpetologist]] from the [[University of California, Berkeley]]. He specialized in the [[anatomy]] of [[snake]]s and the [[systematics]] of the western [[Garter snake]]s. {{Authority control|VIAF=103551768}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Fox, Wade | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 1920 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = 1964 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Fox, Wade}} [[Category:American herpetologists]] [[Category:1920 births]] [[Category:1964 deaths]] [[Category:American zoologists]] [[Category:University of California, Berkeley faculty]] {{US-zoologist-stub}}
